title: Rustopsy
description: A Rust-based tool for analyzing and visualizing system calls. It provides a deep dive into process behavior and resource usage.

title: NetSentry
description: A lightweight network intrusion detection system tailored for small home networks. Detects anomalies in real-time.

title: CipherVault
description: A secure, offline password manager built with C++ and Qt. Focuses on local encryption and zero-knowledge architecture.
